name: Wow an Update! - Original Just Dance Now!
description: Take a ride through memory lane with this style!
additional_info:
Not fully like the original! (obviously)

Update:

-Fixed up some wonky looking things

-Fixed Stars animation returning to original degree rotation

-Changed song selection item containers to mimic the original way of the layout

-Made the screen showing you how to connect look better

-Changed different fonts for a better effect

-Removed the vip danceroom box so it won't show (Don't know if it worked, if it didn't please tell me)

-Adjusted some things in coach selection
